alert.note: Alert for Elkhart; Kosciusko; Lagrange; Noble (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 2:30AM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Elkhart, northwestern Noble, northeastern Kosciusko and southwestern Lagrange Counties through 315 AM EDT... At 230 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Dunlap to near Goshen to Nappanee. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Goshen, Nappanee, Ligonier, Syracuse, Dunlap, Albion, Wakarusa, Milford, Topeka, Millersburg, New Paris, Benton, Locke, Cromwell, Honeyville, Foraker, Lake Wawasee, Gravelton, Waterford Mills and Knapp Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
